Adelbert Ploss

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Demond Plase; Plass
  2. Foster Name: Del
  3. Alternate Foster Name: Delmond Faeh; Delmond Fach
  4. Foster Family: Henry G. and Lillian Fach
  5. Location of Family: Republican City, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Unknown
  8. Age on Arrival: 10
  9. Date of Birth: 1906, NY
  10. Date of Death: 1994-03-27, Central City, NE
  11. Gender: male
  12. Source: Patricia J. Young, and Frances E. Marks. Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 199-203; National Orphan Train Complex; Crossroads vol. 29, p. 9; 1920 United States Federal Census.
